name: Comanche: Maximum Overkill - Mission Disk 1
summary: Comanche: Maximum Overkill - Mission Disk 1 is an expansion for the helicopter combat simulation game Comanche: Maximum Overkill. This add-on content extends the original game with new missions and scenarios for players to tackle. The game puts players in control of the RAH-66 Comanche helicopter, a stealth attack helicopter. Players engage in combat missions, utilizing the Comanche's advanced weaponry and stealth capabilities to complete objectives. The expansion likely introduces new environments, enemy types, and mission structures to provide fresh challenges for players who completed the base game. As a mission disk, it focuses on expanding gameplay content rather than introducing significant new features or mechanics. Comanche: Maximum Overkill - Mission Disk 1 aims to provide additional content for fans of the original game, offering more opportunities to experience the game's blend of realistic helicopter simulation and action-packed combat scenarios.
